topic.title: Horizon PMS Reservation System
topic.shortdesc: This topic provides an overview of the reservation system in the Horizon Property Management System (PMS), a fictional tool for managing hotel room boookings. It describes key tasks for front desk staff.

section.title: System Purpose
section.p: The Horizon PMS reservation system enables hotel staff to create, modify, and cancel room bookings efficiently. It integrates with guest check-in processes and room availability tracking.

section.title: Creating a Reservation
section.p: Follow these steps to create a new booking:

li.p: Navigate to the Reservations in the Horizon PMS dashboard.
Enter guest details, including name, contact information, and stay dates.
Select an available room from the displayed list.

dlentry.dd: Full name of the primary guest (required).
Selected room category, such as standard or suite (required).
